verses.roman:
dui-jane nīlācale rahiba eka-saṅge
sukhe goṅāiba kāla kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge

synonyms: dui-jane—both of us; nīlācale—at Jagannātha Purī; rahiba—shall stay; eka-saṅge—together; sukhe—in happiness; goṅāiba—shall pass; kāla—time; kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge—in the pleasure of discussing topics about Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "The two of us shall remain together at Jagannātha Purī and happily pass our time discussing Kṛṣṇa."
